More examplesFewer examplesDaniels was in charge of the lab's serology unit.Serology, which analyzed blood types, was the main tool used in sexual assault cases.He was certain that the serology tests would clear him of the rape.Forensic serology is the study of blood and how certain chemical reagents can permit detection.
